name: product-crud-api
description: CRUD REST API for products using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB

scripts.docs: node -e "const swaggerUi = require('swagger-ui-express'); const YAML = require('yamljs'); const express = require('express'); const app = express(); const swaggerDocument = YAML.load('./openapi.yaml'); app.use('/api-docs', swaggerUi.serve, swaggerUi.setup(swaggerDocument)); app.listen(8080, () => console.log('API Docs available at http://localhost:8080/api-docs'));"
scripts.validate-api: node -e "const YAML = require('yamljs'); const fs = require('fs'); try { YAML.load('./openapi.yaml'); JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./openapi.json', 'utf8')); console.log('✅ OpenAPI files are valid'); } catch(e) { console.error('❌ Error:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
